A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was a huge disappointment filled with underdeveloped characters and pointless side plot. This movie that spans hours could have been cut to a 10 min star wars short film with meaningful content. I really felt like I wasted my time on this one. People seem to be trying to stretch really hard to find some underlying meaning to this movie but it was simply just a filler episode. Disney seems to have an agenda they are trying to push and it's overwhelming. with the very blatant \"Braun before brains\" take of every male character we care about\, and simply obnoxious\, power hungry female character. Not impressed.
